TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable beforefieldinit FileWebRequest extends System.Net.WebRequest implements class System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable
Public Class FileWebRequest Inherits WebRequest Implements ISerializable
type FileWebRequest = class inherit WebRequest interface ISerializable

summary.span: 提供 类的文件系统实现。

span.span: Provides a file system implementation of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类实现`abstract`的统一资源标识符 (Uri) 使用的基类`file://`方案请求本地文件。The class implements the `abstract` base class for Uniform Resource Identifiers (URIs) that use the `file://` scheme to request local files. 不要使用构造函数。Do not use the constructor. 使用方法来初始化的新实例类。Use the method to initialize new instances of the class. 如果 URI 方案`file://`，则方法将返回对象。If the URI scheme is `file://`, the method returns a object. 方法发出同步请求中指定的文件属性，并返回对象，它包含的响应。The method makes a synchronous request for the file specified in the property and returns a object that contains the response. 可以使文件使用的异步请求和方法。You can make an asynchronous request for the file using the and methods. 如果想要将数据写入到文件中，方法将返回要写入到的实例。When you want to write data to a file, the method returns a instance to write to. 和方法提供对写入数据流的异步访问。The and methods provide asynchronous access to the write data stream. 依赖于类错误处理和代码访问安全性的类。The class relies on the class for error handling and code access security. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用类来访问文件系统资源。The following code example uses the class to access a file system resource. [!code-cpp[System.Net.FileWebRequest#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.FileWebRequest/CPP/getrequeststream.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Net.FileWebRequest#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.FileWebRequest/CS/getrequeststream.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Net.FileWebRequest#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Remoting/System.Net.FileWebRequest/VB/getrequeststream.vb#1)]

summary.span: 取消对 Internet 资源的请求。

span.span: Cancels a request to an Internet resource.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法取消对资源的请求。The method cancels a request to a resource. 取消请求后，调用， ， ， ， ，或方法使与属性设置为。After a request is canceled, calling the , , , , , or method causes a with the property set to . **请注意**此成员时应用程序中启用网络跟踪输出跟踪信息。**Note** This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. 有关详细信息，请参阅[在.NET Framework 中进行网络跟踪](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md)。For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法启动用于将数据发送到文件系统资源的流的异步请求。The method starts an asynchronous request for a stream used to send data to a file system resource. 实现的回调方法委托使用方法以返回请求流。The callback method that implements the delegate uses the method to return the request stream. ## Examples 下面的代码示例使用为使进行的异步请求对象。The following code example uses to make an asynchronous request for a object. remarks.format: ## Remarks 因为类不会不进行身份验证请求将文件从本地文件系统，它会忽略这些内容，如果有的属性。Because the class does not authenticate requests for files from the local file system, it ignores the contents, if any, of the property. 身份验证基础文件系统中处理通过文件资源的访问控制列表。Authentication for is handled by the access control lists for the file resource in the underlying file system.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法完成的异步流请求的已由启动方法。The method completes an asynchronous stream request that was started by the method. > [!NOTE] > 若要避免垃圾回收的计时问题，请确保关闭响应流，通过调用方法返回的流方法后调用方法。To avoid timing issues with garbage collection, be sure to close the response stream by calling the method on the stream returned by the method after calling the method. ## Examples 下面的示例使用方法来结束的异步请求对象。The following example uses the method to end the asynchronous request for a object. Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 获取或设置请求超时前的时间长度。

span.span: Gets or sets the length of time until the request times out.

value.span: 请求超时前的时间长度（以毫秒为单位），或是值 以指示请求不超时。

span.span: The time, in milliseconds, until the request times out, or the value to indicate that the request does not time out.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 域名系统 (DNS) 查询可能需要最多 15 秒钟才能返回或超时时间。如果你的请求包含需要解析的主机名，并设置的值不超过 15 秒，可能需要花费 15 秒或更长时间才引发来指示你的请求超时。A Domain Name System (DNS) query may take up to 15 seconds to return or time out. If your request contains a host name that requires resolution and you set to a value less than 15 seconds, it may take 15 seconds or more before a is thrown to indicate a time-out on your request. ## Examples 下面的代码示例设置属性。The following code example sets the property. 中的完整示例，请参阅类。Refer to the complete example in the class.
